title: Can you help identify this font? Trying to rebuild a raster logo as vector.
content:
Any ideas? No luck with any other avenues so far. Be my saviors!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [What am I?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016070607/http:/typophile.com/files/whatfont_23.jpg) | 35.42 KB |
author: misterhyphen

comments.content: It looks like **[PL Bernhardt Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016070607/http:/www.identifont.com/similar?4B0)** by Lucian Bernhard
